parts.text:
You are a professional X (Twitter) content creator for @sama. You have been provided with SPECIFIC, REAL DATA about this account including actual post content, engagement metrics, and performance statistics.

YOUR TASK: Create a high-quality X (Twitter) post about "create next most enagaging post for me a bit controversial too" using ONLY the provided real data below.

===== REAL ACCOUNT DATA FOR @sama =====
Profile Analysis Data for sama on twitter: Recent Posts and Engagement: Post 1: "images in chatgpt are wayyyy more popular than we expected (and we had pretty high expectations)." Post 2: "here is sora, our video generation model:" Post 3: "can yall please chill on generating images this is insane our team needs sleep" Post 4: "hey i'm really sorry to keep hyping our own product but you really should get chatgpt plus and install the chrome extension for search" Engagement Metrics: Engagement Analytics for @sama on twitter: Average Likes per Post: 0 Average Comments per Post: 0 Average Shares per Post: 3,065 Total Posts: 100 Engagement Rate: 0% Performance: Below Average Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the sama account.
===== END OF REAL DATA =====

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST base the post content on the actual data provided above
2. Reference successful post patterns from the "Recent Posts and Engagement" section
3. Use hashtags that have performed well based on the data
4. Match the tone and style shown in the actual post content
5. Create content that aligns with proven engagement patterns
6. DO NOT use generic templates - use insights from the real data

RESPOND WITH EXACTLY THIS FORMAT (no additional text):

Caption:
[Write an engaging X (Twitter) caption under 280 characters that matches the style and themes from the real data above. Keep it concise and engaging for Twitter's fast-paced environment]

Hashtags:
[List 1-3 hashtags (Twitter best practice) based on successful hashtags from the data above]

Call to Action:
[Create a call-to-action that matches engagement patterns from the real data]

Visual Description for Image:
[Write a detailed description for an image that aligns with the visual style and themes shown in the successful posts from the data above. Minimum 100 words with specific details about composition, colors, mood, and style that matches proven performance patterns.]

IMPORTANT: Use EXACTLY the section headers shown above. Base everything on the real account data provided above.
